title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using the 'Close all saved' functionality, the file is not always closed as expected.
OB: Sometimes, when selecting 'Close all saved', one or more files remain open.
EB: The expected behavior is that all open files should be closed when selecting 'Close all saved', especially when no changes have been made to the files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Make sure that some of the files have been saved and others have not.
3. Go to the 'File' menu and select 'Close all saved'.
4. Verify if all the files have been closed.

Note: Please mention any specific conditions or file types that cause this issue, if applicable.
